imdb.plot outline: Hosted by fashion influencer Mallory Ervin, "How to Wear" takes viewers on a fun, playful, and accessible fashion journey, teaching fans how to recreate the looks and trends of favorite country lifestyle celebrities from the glamorous red carpet to the sold-out concert stage to everyday popular street style.
imdb.title: How to Wear
plot: Hosted by fashion influencer Mallory Ervin, "_How to Wear_ (qv)" takes viewers on a fun, playful, and accessible fashion journey, teaching fans how to recreate the looks and trends of favorite country lifestyle celebrities from the glamorous red carpet to the sold-out concert stage to everyday popular street style.
